name: The Commander
ai_analysis: The current environment is transitional with falling rates supporting risk assets. The portfolio maintains a core crypto allocation with a BTC-heavy stance due to ETH weakness. Energy and Banking sectors are favored due to oil strength and falling rates. The frontier stance remains defensive due to flat AI breakthrough frequency.

sentiment.rate_path_impact: Falling rates support risk assets but uncertainty remains

crypto_90.rationale: BTC.D < 55% but ETH weakness confirms BTC preference

metals_10.rationale: Gold price increase and defensive stance

best_return_to_risk_allocation.rationale: Oil strength and TASI relative strength

frontier.rationale: Flat AI breakthrough frequency and transitional risk state

old_stand_verdict.explanation: Core allocation remains but frontier stance and risk state have changed
